oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greetings from Nashville, Tennessee, 1944
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A souvenir postcard sending greetings from Nashville, Tennessee. Several attractions are depicted inside the block letters of Nashville. From left to right they are: Sam Davis Monument, War Memorial Building, Memorial Square, the Hermitage, Jackson Monument, State Capitol, Parthenon, Union Station, and the Peace Monument. This card design was popular during the time period and was printed in several different background colors. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845--Homes and haunts--Tennessee--Hermitage
Hermitage (Hermitage, Tenn.); Parthenon (Art museum : Nashville, Tenn.); War Memorial Building (Nashville, Tenn.); Union Station (Nashville, Tenn.); Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.)
